#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
ll ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,g;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        g=0;
        ll a[n+1];
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
        }
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            while(a[i]>=i)
            {
                a[i]-=i;
                g++;
            }
        }
        if(g%2==0)
            cout<<"BOB\n";
        else
            cout<<"ALICE\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
